Package project

Class ShoppingBag

java.lang.Object
project.ShoppingBag
public class ShoppingBag
extends java.lang.Object
This is the ShoppingBag class, a container class for the GroceryItem class. In this class, grocery items can be held as a list of items which can grow with an initial capacity of 5 (automatically grows past this limit). Items can be added, removed, and the contents of the bag can be displayed. The sales price and tax can be listed as well.
Author:
Christian Rodriguez, Mohamed Moussa

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingBag

      public ShoppingBag()
      Default constructor for the ShoppingBag class (The only constructor for ShoppingBag). Instantiates the GroceryItem array, and sets initial capacity to 5

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(GroceryItem item)
      Find an item in the grocery item bag given the GroceryItem object. Find the index of the item and return it. Helper Method used in removing items form the bag.
      Parameters:
      item - GroceryItem object to search for
      Returns:
      Array index if item was found, -1 otherwise.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Grows the capacity of the grocery item bag. Increase the capacity by +5, and copies GroceryItems into new bag.

    • add

      public void add​(GroceryItem item)
      Adds an item to the grocery item bag. If the capacity of the bag is met, the bag capacity is increased.
      Parameters:
      item - GroceryItem instance to be added to the grocery item bag

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(GroceryItem item)
      Removes an item from the grocery item bag. Finds the index of the item to be removed and moves the last item in the array to this index. Then the item reference at the last index is set to NULL
      Parameters:
      item - to remove from the grocery item bag
      Returns:
      true if the item was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • salesPrice

      public double salesPrice()
      Returns the total sales price of the items in the grocery item bag.
      Returns:
      sales price of the items in the grocery item bag.

    • salesTax

      public double salesTax()
      Returns the total sales Tax of the taxable items in the grocery item bag.
      Returns:
      sales tax of the items in the grocery item bag

    • print

      public void print()
      Print the items in the grocery item bag. If the bag is empty prints "Bag is empty"

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Test bed main for ShoppingBag Tests the methods: add(), remove(), grow(), salesTax() for different cases
      Parameters:
      args - for test bed main
